name: X-Mas Disaster
overview: Made for Christmas Tree Competition 2009, the game was put together in two weeks. Nice graphics and music. Santa's army has decided that this was the last Christmas the brats have their way and tries to take over the world by plunging it into deep winter and taking it over when everyone is huddled near the fireplace. Take down all the Christmas creatures and fight the boss, you must shoot each armor piece to remove it.
